dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A second runway at Astana Airport by 2028? That seems like a massive, uh, undertaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A second runway at Astana Airport by twenty twenty eight? That seems like a massive, uh, undertaking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Completion is expected by 2028," said Deputy Chairman for Commerce Yermek Kumyspayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It is, but it's part of a major investment deal with a company from the UAE. They're starting construction in 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is, but it's part of a major investment deal with a company from the U A E. They're starting construction in twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Major changes are planned for 2026–2027 as part of an investment agreement with a company from the UAE. "The key project for this period is the construction of a second runway. Construction work will begin in 2025 and continue actively through 2026–2027.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But why now? Is the current runway really that overwhelmed?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But why now? Is the current runway really that overwhelmed?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the deputy chairman, Yermek Kumyspayev, said it'll increase capacity and allow them to renovate the old one without shutting things down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the deputy chairman, Yermek Kumyspayev, said it'll increase capacity and allow them to renovate the old one without shutting things down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, the new runway will increase the airport's capacity and will allow for the future reconstruction of the current runway without disrupting operations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm. And what about all this talk of biometrics and automation? Sounds expensive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm. And what about all this talk of biometrics and automation? Sounds expensive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're planning to integrate biometric control points and intelligent passenger systems during 2026-2027. It's about handling future growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they're planning to integrate biometric control points and intelligent passenger systems during twenty twenty six to twenty twenty seven. It's about handling future growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "In 2026–2027, the airport also plans to actively integrate biometric control points, intelligent passenger flow management systems, as well as automation of logistics and service. All changes are being implemented gradually, in accordance with projected passenger and cargo traffic growth," he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Future growth? Are passenger numbers really projected to jump that much?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Future growth? Are passenger numbers really projected to jump that much?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: According to the airport reps, yeah—both passenger and, um, cargo traffic are driving these upgrades.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: According to the airport reps, yeah-both passenger and, um, cargo traffic are driving these upgrades.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All changes are being implemented gradually, in accordance with projected passenger and cargo traffic growth," he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And who's going to run all this new tech? Do they even have the expertise locally?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And who's going to run all this new tech? Do they even have the expertise locally?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Good point—they're sending Kazakhstani specialists for training abroad, like to aviation academies in the UAE.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good point-they're sending Kazakhstani specialists for training abroad, like to aviation academies in the U A E.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During this period, Kazakhstani specialists will also be trained both domestically and abroad—in aviation academies and airports in the UAE.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Training abroad? That sounds costly. Will it be worth the investment?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Training abroad? That sounds costly. Will it be worth the investment?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They seem to think so. The idea is to prepare them for digital systems and modern equipment without relying too much on foreign help long-term.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They seem to think so. The idea is to prepare them for digital systems and modern equipment without relying too much on foreign help long-term.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They will be prepared to work with new digital systems, logistics, and modern equipment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I guess if it streamlines operations and reduces delays, travelers might actually notice a difference.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess if it streamlines operations and reduces delays, travelers might actually notice a difference.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And phased implementation means less disruption—which is always a plus with airport projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And phased implementation means less disruption-which is always a plus with airport projects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All changes are being implemented gradually, in accordance with projected passenger and cargo traffic growth," he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True. Let's see if they hit that 2028 deadline for the new runway. Delays wouldn't surprise me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. Let's see if they hit that twenty twenty eight deadline for the new runway. Delays wouldn't surprise me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Fair, but with UAE partnership and structured training, they might just pull it off smoother than we think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair, but with U A E partnership and structured training, they might just pull it off smoother than we think.
